person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Tallinna Pank , one of the largest banks in Estonia , made a 11-month 1996 net profit of 46.6 million kroons , the bank said on Friday .

Let's think step by step.

1. Tallinna Pank
2. Estonia (implied, as Tallinna Pank is identified as one of the largest banks in Estonia)

The paragraph does not explicitly mention any other "Person" entities.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Tallinna Pank

The paragraph only mentions the bank as a person entity. Other entities mentioned, such as Estonia, are not considered person entities in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
